property.value: MIlitary and civilian Muslims from various countries praying at Kandahar Air Field

note.text: Religion is a fundamental part of life in Afghanistan and Islam functions as a code for social behavior for the majority. People adhere to their religion to varying degrees, but you should always act conservatively. Even if your counterparts seem Westernized, assume that religion plays an important role in their lives. Not doing so could jeopardize your relationship or their respect for you.
